Detailed Description

Type: Class

Purpose: This is the general Xform for Named Color Profiles.

Purpose: Does the actual application of the Xform.

Args: pApply = ApplyXform object containging temporary storage used during Apply DstColorName = Destination string where the color name result is stored, SrcPixel = Source pixel which is to be applied.
